item.title: urinary bladder
item.description:
Tissue Sentence Context


Table 1. Analysis of context sentence of urinary bladder tissue in 7 abstracts.

PMID Senteces
11826504 They include treatment of solid tumors with cycloplatam alone in urinary bladder tumors, cervical carcinoma and malignant pleurites of various etiology as well as in combination with other cytostatics (carcinoma of the prostate, pleural mesothelioma and urinary bladder tumors).
20067210 The most frequent tumor sites were: lung (51.6%), larynx (18.9%), pleura (7.6%), urinary bladder (6.0%), lymphatic and hemopoietic tissues (3.9%), skin (3.7%).
2051987 The variety of the neoplasms in these cases were carcinomas of the stomach, pancreas, esophagus, renal pelvis, bile duct, colon and urinary bladder, and pleural mesothelioma.
23749908 Some reports have shown differential expression of DDX39 in tumor cells or tissues such as lung squamous cell cancer, gastrointestinal stromal tumor and urinary bladder cancer.
23898070 DDX39 is an Asp-Glu-Ala-Asp (DEAD)-box RNA helicase reported to be overexpressed in tumor cells, such as lung squamous cell cancer, gastrointestinal stromal tumor, urinary bladder cancer and malignant pleural mesothelioma. [â€¦] In urinary bladder cancer cells, overexpression of this protein is intimately bound with tumorigenesis and poor prognosis.
2531313 Malignant tumours of the urinary bladder, the gastro-intestinal tract, the larynx and the oesophagus in workers may also be ascribed to the specific exposure in some cases.
25599121 In conclusion, environmental and behavioral factors, early-childhood exposures, and infections may play a major role in the risk of esophageal, stomach, liver, nasopharyngeal and hypopharyngeal cancers, malignant pleural mesothelioma, breast, gynecological, testicular, urinary bladder, and thyroid cancers.
